B

BankingApp - Class in com.vmworld
Main application class that launches the banking system.
Entry point of the program.
BankingApp() - Constructor for class com.vmworld.BankingApp
 
BankingController - Class in com.vmworld.controller
The main controller for the VM Savings Bank console application.
It manages user interaction via console.
Handles input, validations, menu-driven options and delegates logic to services.
BankingController() - Constructor for class com.vmworld.controller.BankingController
Initializes controller with scanner and service instance.
BankingDatabase - Class in com.vmworld.repository
Simulates an in-memory database that holds all customer records for the banking application.
Uses static array to simulate persistent storage.
BankingDatabase() - Constructor for class com.vmworld.repository.BankingDatabase
